item.title: Christmas Brownies
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30ml/1fl oz brandy
  • 100g/3½oz dried cranberries
  • 300g/10½oz dark chocolate, broken into chunks
  • 200g/7oz butter
  • 4 free-range eggs
  • 300g/10½oz light muscovado sugar
  • 200g/7oz plain flour
  • 1 tsp mixed spice
  • 100g/3½oz pecans, roughly chopped
  • icing sugar, to serve

Method

Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4 and line a 30x20cm/12x8in tin with baking parchment.

Gently heat the brandy then add the cranberries and leave to soak while you prepare the brownie mix.

item.title: Cornflake Cakes
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 200g/8oz chocolate
  • 2tbsp/30ml golden syrup
  • 50g/2oz unsalted butter
  • ornflakes

Method

  1. Melt the chocolate with the syrup and butter.
  2. Add enough cornflakes to mix.
  3. Spoon the mixture into paper cases and allow to set.
